DESCRIPTION: Earn gold at the end of combat if this card is not exhausted.
Special Power that imposes a restriction in exchange for an advantage.
Can be partially paid with gold, at a rate of #b20 gold per Energy.
When you add this card to your deck, add a Doubloon to your deck.
Defeat ALL enemies with HP equal or lower than your piety at the end of your turn. Lose #b1 piety when dealing unblocked attack damage.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
